title: Cody Simpson and Miley Cyrus go Instagram official
text:
Miley is being looked after being Cody (Picture: Getty/Instagram)

Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson have gone Instagram official after the Australian singer turned up at her door to play doctor as she battles tonsillitis.

The 26-year-old shared some snaps of her looking under the weather as she recuperates, claiming, rightly so that ‘tonsillitis is a f***ing f***’ but she then revealed that Cody had rocked up to help her through.

‘The DR is back, luckiest,’ she captioned a snap of Cody playing guitar on her sofa.

After a very public start, when Miley was spotted snogging Cody over an Acai bowl after ending her whirlwind relationship with reality TV star Kaitlynn Carter, the pair don’t seem keen to hide their feelings.

From Elvis serenades, to calling her ‘baby’, the 22-year-old singer is clearly smitten with the Wrecking Ball hitmaker.

Dr Cody in the house (Picture: @mileycyrus)

But he recently took it to a whole new level by sharing a poem that seemed meant for Miley to his Prince of Neptune amateur poet Instagram account.

He wrote: ‘the moon’s souvenir

the boulevardier

a ballerina on the promenade

we open our curtains

to the domesticated world

for a natural hour

spinning elvis records

and making love

in the soft jewelled morning.’

The self-penned poem accompanies a photo of a blonde pony-tailed woman – who looks very much like Miley – gazing as if in a daydream as she leans back on a balcony, while a blue curtain billows around her.

The Perfect singer has made no secret in the past of his interest in Miley, confessing in interviews that she was his ‘childhood celebrity crush’.
